name: Space Isn't So Lonely
description:
Use the arrow keys to play.

Today is your best friend (and hopeless crush) Rook's birthday! You have a card to deliver, but somehow you can't find him. The ship you're on is tiny; where could he have gone?

Both the Bitsy engine and the forest zone tile pack were created by Adam Le Doux. The cover image is courtesy of Pixabay's Pizar Kestrap while the background is from Pixabay. The rest of the artwork is by me. This is a silly and quick concept to showcase intimacy (and these two are both very sweet and very dumb).
